1234
0 + 100 * 50 * 0.5 = 2500
2500 + 2500 * 200 * 0.004 = 4500
4500 + 2000 * 100 * 0.1 * 0.01 = 4700

1243
0 + 100 * 50 * 0.5 = 2500
2500 + 2500 * 100 * 0.01 = 5000
5000 + 2500 * 200 * 0.1 * 0.004 = 5200

1423
0 + 100 * 100 * 0.01 = 100
100 + 100 * 50 * 0.5 = 2600
2600 + 2500 * 200 * 0.004 * 0.1 = 2800

1432 <- local minimum
0 + 100 * 100 * 0.01 = 100
100 + 100 * 200 * 0.1 = 2100
2100 + 2000 * 50 * 0.5 * 0.004 = 2300

2134 == 1234

2143 == 1243

2314
0 + 50 * 200 * 0.004 = 40
40 + 40 * 100 * 0.5 = 2040
2040 + 2000 * 100 * 0.1 * 0.01 = 2240

2341 <- global minimum
0 + 50 * 200 * 0.004 = 40
40 + 40 * 100 * 0.1 = 440
440 + 400 * 100 * 0.5 * 0.01 = 640

3214 == 2314

3241 == 2341

3412
0 + 200 * 100 * 0.1 = 2000
2000 + 2000 * 100 * 0.01 = 4000
4000 + 2000 * 50 * 0.5 * 0.004 = 4200

3421
0 + 200 * 100 * 0.1 = 2000
2000 + 2000 * 50 * 0.004 = 2400
2400 + 400 * 100 * 0.5 * 0.01 = 2600

4123 == 1423

4132 == 1432

4312 == 3412

4321 == 3421
